name: Vagas
overview: A pioneer in e-recruitment solutions, VAGAS is the Brazilian leader in this market segment. Its main product â€“ VAGAS e-partner software â€“ is used by more than 1400 companies of all sizes and in all areas to maximize the performance of their HR and recruitment departments. The company is also responsible for VAGAS.com.br, one of the largest and most highly regarded career sites in Brazil, bringing quality recruitment to VAGAS e-partner software client companies. The VAGAS system manages more than 50 million resumes registered in client databanks and VAGAS.com.br, generating a daily average of 300,000 visitors. According to Alexa*, VAGAS is ranked among the top 120 most popular Brazilian sites and in the top 6 ,000 global sites, with average monthly traffic of 100 million page views.
